body_html: "If you are really using a virtual environment, it cannot, as far as I know, limit the memory a process can use. If you're using a virtual machine, or a container system such as Docker, it can." -- Thanks for the reply. Actually I'm not 100% sure whether I'm using a virtual environment or virtual machine or Docker (sorry I'm not major in computer and not very familiar with computer systems). If I'm using VM or Docker, how can I do it? @takluyver
